text: Danubio Futbol Club is a football club from Montevideo, Uruguay. == Overview == Danubio was founded by two brothers, Miguel and Juan Lazaroff on 1 March 1932 together with other youths from a school in Montevideo. The club name is a reference to the Danube river, a major waterway in Europe. == Other websites == * Category:Football clubs in Montevideo Category:1932 establishments in South America
title: Danubio F.C.
